education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

experience.title: Programming Intern
description: Contributed to an educational website vocabbrain.com meant to help students learn vocabulary while working with a team remotely
Utilized their SQL database, making queries to access information
Used HTML, CSS, Javascript, and Django (Python) to create vocabulary-based games such as Hangman

experience.title: Learning Assistant (for ICS 6B: Boolean Algebra)
description: Coordinated remotely with the professor, students, and other Learning Assistants (LA) to better the learning experience of the course
Helped students with material during class discussions and during my office hours
Organized scheduling for the other Learning Assistants (LA) for course coverage during the week
Proofread through quizzes to analyze whether the questions made sense and looked for typos

projects.title: Rexable
description: Led a small team remotely to create a wellness app for Android and iOS
Used the Kivy framework to design and implement the application in Python
Utilized MongoDB databases to collect and store information about users
Created Login System for the application using JSON Store module in Kivy
Webscraped and displayed various recipes from different sites

projects.title: Web Crawler
description: Participated in a team setting to create a web crawler
Web scraped information from the internet and compiled them into a database
